meanings.definition: A radioactive metallic chemical element with the symbol Pa and atomic number 91.
meanings.sent1: Protactinium is used in scientific research to study radioactive decay.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered protactinium while studying uranium ores.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled protactinium in the lab, causing a small panic.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as rare and precious as protactinium in the world of music.
meanings.sent5: The glow of protactinium under the microscope was mesmerizing and beautiful.
